original_title: Sexy Beasts: Vamps, Wolves and Mutants
overview: TVGN gets its fright on with a look at some of the sexiest, scariest creatures in TV and film! Feast your eyes on Ryan Reynolds, Nina Dobrev, Aaliyah,True Blood's cast, Milla Jovovich, Brad Pitt, Taylor Lautner and more!
title: Sexy Beasts: Vamps, Wolves and Mutants
